1.1.1 - Average number of working and private hours of teachers per week (aspect of work life balance)

  • Data
  • Metadata

Total [hours]

Information about indicator

Name of the indicator 1.1.1 Average number of working and private hours of teachers per week (aspect of work life balance)
Measure unit hour (hours)
Description of the indicator The data shows average number of working and private hours of teachers per week (primary and secondary schools in Flanders in 2018)
Data sources Modular Online Time Use Survey (MOTUS)
